Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to grievance procedures for proceedings involving the New York City Housing Authority
Summary: Requires the New York City Housing Authority to create policies regarding administrative procedures that conform with Title 42 Sections 13661-13662 of the United States Code and any relevant guidance developed by the Office of Public and Indian Housing of the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development with respect to proceedings involving decisions of the Authority.
LawCode: Add ยง160, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to grievance procedures for proceedings involving the New York City Housing Authority
